query.statement:
SELECT Z.CHK, Z.FLAG, Z.BS201_RDT || '-' || Z.BS201_SEQ MNO, Z.AGB, Z.GBN, Z.DEV, Z.GNM, Z.SPT, Z.USE, Z.USR, Z.ADR, Z.RQT, Z.SNO, Z.OAM, Z.YST, Z.QTY, Z.TYP, Z.SPC, Z.BS201_RDT, Z.BS201_SEQ, Z.BS201_SIR, Z.BS201_GNO, (SELECT MAX(K.BS205_CDT) FROM SAPHEE.ZBST205 K WHERE K.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND K.BS205_RDT = Z.BS201_RDT AND K.BS205_SEQ = Z.BS201_SEQ AND K.BS205_SIR = Z.BS201_SIR) CDT FROM ( SELECT X.CHK, X.FLAG, X.AGB, X.GBN, X.DEV, X.GNM, X.SPT, X.USE, X.USR, X.ADR, X.RQT, X.SNO, X.OAM, X.YST, X.QTY, X.TYP, X.SPC, X.BS201_RDT, X.BS201_SEQ, X.BS201_SIR, X.BS201_GNO FROM ( SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, CASE A.BS201_AGB WHEN 'A' THEN '실행가' WHEN 'B' THEN '예산가' ELSE A.BS201_AGB END AGB, (SELECT M.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE M WHERE M.MANDT = A.MANDT AND M.CODE1 = 'CS131' AND M.LANG = #G_LANG# AND M.CODE2 = A.BS201_GBN) GBN, A.BS201_DEV DEV, A.BS201_GNM GNM, A.BS201_SPT SPT, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = A.MANDT AND CODE1 = 'BS403' AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE2 = A.BS201_USE) USE, (SELECT U.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF U WHERE U.MANDT = A.MANDT AND U.USERNUMB = A.BS201_CID) USR, A.BS201_AD1 || ' ' || A.BS201_AD2 ADR, A.BS201_RQT RQT, A.BS201_AYM || '-' || A.BS201_ASQ SNO, CASE WHEN A.BS201_YST = 'A6' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUM(B.BS202_OAM),0) FROM SAPHEE.ZBST202 B WHERE B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.BS202_RDT = A.BS201_RDT AND B.BS202_SEQ = A.BS201_SEQ AND B.BS202_SIR = A.BS201_SIR) ELSE 0 END OAM, CASE WHEN A.BS201_YST = '' THEN 'A0' ELSE A.BS201_YST END YST, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZBST202 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS202_RDT = A.BS201_RDT AND BS202_SEQ = A.BS201_SEQ AND BS202_SIR = A.BS201_SIR) QTY, (SELECT BS202_TYP FROM SAPHEE.ZBST202 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS202_RDT = A.BS201_RDT AND BS202_SEQ = A.BS201_SEQ AND BS202_SIR = A.BS201_SIR AND BS202_ISR = '001') TYP, (SELECT BS202_USE||BS202_MAN||'-'||BS202_OPN||BS202_SPD||'-'||BS202_STP FROM SAPHEE.ZBST202 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS202_RDT = A.BS201_RDT AND BS202_SEQ = A.BS201_SEQ AND BS202_SIR = A.BS201_SIR AND BS202_ISR = '001') SPC, A.BS201_RDT, A.BS201_SEQ, A.BS201_SIR, A.BS201_GNO FROM SAPHEE.ZBST201 A, ( SELECT C.BS201_RDT, C.BS201_SEQ, C.BS201_SIR FROM ( SELECT B.BS201_RDT, B.BS201_SEQ, B.BS201_SIR, ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY BS201_RDT, BS201_SEQ ORDER BY BS201_RDT, BS201_SEQ, BS201_SIR DESC) RNO FROM SAPHEE.ZBST201 B WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) C WHERE C.RNO = 1 ) X WHERE 1=1 AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.BS201_RDT = X.BS201_RDT AND A.BS201_SEQ = X.BS201_SEQ AND A.BS201_SIR = X.BS201_SIR AND A.BS201_PST = '30' AND A.BS201_JRT = '10' AND A.BS201_AGB = #AGB# AND A.BS201_DEL = ''
AND A.BS201_YST IN ('','A0')
AND A.BS201_YST = #YST#
AND A.BS201_YST = #YST#
AND A.BS201_RQT BETWEEN #FRQT# AND #TRQT#
AND A.BS201_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BS201_GNO = #GNO#
AND A.BS201_CID = #USR#
AND A.BS201_YST = #YST#
AND A.BS201_GBN = #GBN#
) X ) Z WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY Z.RQT
ORDER BY Z.GNM
ORDER BY Z.SPT
ORDER BY Z.CID
ASC
DESC
WITH UR
